references.paper_title: A statistical model for tensor PCA
references.reason: This paper introduces the spiked tensor model, the central problem studied in the current work.

references.paper_title: Phase transition in the spiked random tensor with Rademacher prior
references.reason: This paper establishes information-theoretic limits for the spiked tensor model, providing context for the computational-statistical gap explored in the current work.

references.paper_title: The landscape of the spiked tensor model
references.reason: This paper analyzes the loss landscape of the spiked tensor model, offering insights into the challenges of classical optimization algorithms.
This paper introduces the quantum approximate optimization algorithm (QAOA), the quantum algorithm studied in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Reducibility and statistical-computational gaps from secret leakage
references.reason: This paper proves computational lower bounds for classical algorithms solving the spiked tensor problem, highlighting the potential for quantum speedup.
